title: Collaborative Learning-Based Language Proficiency Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Language Grammar and Vocabulary
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing practical language skills used in work environments for practicing professionals, integrating digital collaboration tools via personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize over 20 work-related language expressions through 4-person collaborative learning activities.
Learners can perform self-assessments based on peer feedback during collaborative learning with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can successfully submit language project deliverables over three times using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
